programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: And Here's Mike With the Weather

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 - Outro Susto de Filme
programme.desc: Acabada de sair da faculdade, Cindy trabalha agora na televisão. Por seu lado, a sua melhor amiga morre misteriosamente ao ver uma cassete e estranhos círculos começam a aparecer na quinta de Tom. Entretanto, Cindy descobre que os alienígenas planeiam uma invasão à Terra.

programme.title: 47 Metros de Terror
programme.desc: Numa viagem ao México, duas irmãs aventuram-se num mergulho para observar os tubarões. No entanto, tudo corre terrivelmente mal quando o cabo que prendia a jaula de observação se parte e ambas ficam presas no fundo do oceano a 47 metros de profundidade...

programme.title: A Barbearia 3: O Próximo Corte
programme.desc: Quando o ambiente no bairro da Barbearia do Calvin se torna cada vez pior, à medida que os dias passam, a fiel clientela junta-se para mudar a vizinhança para melhor.

programme.title: Festa de Natal da Empresa
programme.desc: A diretora-geral Carol Vanstone tenta encerrar a sucursal do seu irmão folião, pelo que ele e o seu diretor técnico, Josh Parker, têm de reunir os colegas de trabalho e dar a mais estrondosa festa de Natal! Tudo para impressionar um potencial cliente, que irá salvar os seus empregos.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Jules e Vincent, dois assassinos, tentam recuperar uma mala roubada de Marsellus Wallace. Este pede ainda a Vincent para tomar conta da mulher, Mia. Butch, um pugilista, é pago por Wallace para perder um combate. Já Honey Bunny e Pumpkin, um casal de pequenos ladrões, quer uma mudança de sítio.

programme.title: Embriagado de Amor
programme.desc: Os abusos constantes das sas sete irmãs de Barry Egan mantiveram-no sozinho e incapaz de se apaixonar. Detentor de um lado negro de raiva e violência, pode estar no limite, interiormente. É então que conhece Lena Leonard, uma mulher intensamente doce, mas misteriosa, e a sua viagem romântica começa.

programme.title: Horse Camp: A Love Tail
programme.desc: É um novo ano no campo de equitação de verão, mas desta vez, está tudo diferente: um novo conselheiro chefe, novos amigos para conquistar e, para melhorar as coisas, o fazendeiro tem uma paixão pela instrutora de equitação!

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A viagem espiritual de um ateu de 90 anos e as personagens peculiares que habitam na sua cidade, no meio do nada. Tendo sobrevivido aos seus contemporâneos, o tempestuoso e independente Lucky inicia uma jornada de autoexploração, rumo à iluminação.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Besta
programme.desc: Uma jovem perturbada, a viver numa comunidade isolada, vê-se dividida entre a sua família opressiva e controladora e o encanto de um misterioso estranho, suspeito de uma série de crimes brutais.

programme.title: Embriagado de Amor
programme.desc: Os abusos constantes das sas sete irmãs de Barry Egan mantiveram-no sozinho e incapaz de se apaixonar. Detentor de um lado negro de raiva e violência, pode estar no limite, interiormente. É então que conhece Lena Leonard, uma mulher intensamente doce, mas misteriosa, e a sua viagem romântica começa.

programme.title: Um Dia Perfeito
programme.desc: Uma equipa de ajuda humanitária tenta resolver uma crise numa zona onde decorre um conflito armado. Humor, drama, emoção, rotina, perigo e esperança: tudo cabe num dia perfeito.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. programme.title: Conspiração Terrorista
programme.desc: Após deixar escapar o terrorista responsável por um ataque em Paris, que resultou em dezenas de mortes, Alice Racine, à data agente da CIA, é forçada a viver em Londres como assistente social. Quando toma conhecimento de um novo perigo, o seu mentor volta a chamá-la à ação.

programme.title: Despojos de Inverno
programme.desc: Ree, de 17 anos, luta para encontrar o pai, procurado pela polícia, que desaparece após usar a sua casa como fiança. Confrontada com a possibilidade de perder a casa onde mora com os irmãos, Ree desafia os códigos de silêncio que imperam na sua comunidade e arrisca a vida para salvar a família.
Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: 300: O Início de um Império
programme.desc: O general grego Themistokles tenta unir toda a Grécia ao liderar um ataque que mudará o curso da guerra. Mas o campo de batalha é novo: o mar.

programme.title: Ouro
programme.desc: A história verídica de Kenny Wells, um explorador desesperado por descobrir ouro e enriquecer, que forma equipa com um geólogo tão ambicioso quanto ele. Wells inicia então uma fantástica viagem em busca de ouro, nas profundezas da selva indonésia.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Listo, Steven DePaul, David Straiton, Michael Patrick Jann, Allison Liddi-Brown
Category: Drama|Drama
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR18,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

programme.title: Um Traidor dos Nossos
programme.desc: De férias, Perry e Gail conhecem um extravagante russo que pertence à Máfia. Quando ele lhes pede ajuda para fazer chegar informações confidenciais aos serviços secretos britânicos, Perry e Gail são apanhados no perigoso mundo da espionagem.

programme.title: Estado Livre de Jones
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Newton Knight, um agricultor sulista, e da sua rebelião armada contra a Confederação em plena Guerra Civil. Unindo esforços, Knight despoletou uma revolta que levou o Condado Jones a tornar-se independente.

programme.title: 6 Dias
programme.desc: Em abril de 1980, homens armados invadiram a Embaixada do Irão, em Londres. A história verdadeira dos seis dias de terror aquando da ocupação, que resultou em 26 reféns.

programme.title: Detonação
programme.desc: Josh, um geógrafo, faz uma terrível descoberta: o núcleo da Terra parou de girar. Como resultado, o campo eletromagnético está a deteriorar-se e, dentro de alguns meses, o planeta será destruído. Para evitar esse desfecho trágico, uma expedição é enviada ao centro da Terra.

programme.title: O Expatriado
programme.desc: Ben Logan é um ex-agente da CIA, que se reaproxima da filha depois da morte da ex-mulher. Quando Ben descobre que se tornou alvo de uma conspiração internacional que tenta apagar todos os registos da sua existência, vê-se obrigado a fugir com a filha.

programme.title: Para Além dos Limites
programme.desc: Michael é um vigarista ambicioso que elabora um plano para roubar um casino de luxo na Europa. No entanto, quando está prestes a alcançar o objetivo, encontra pela frente um enigmático rival e, misteriosamente, perde tudo vendo o seu plano desmascarado.

programme.title: Mapas Para as Estrelas
programme.desc: Uma viagem ao coração de uma família de Hollywood e ao mundo supérfluo e tortuoso das celebridades egoístas e dos seus assistentes. Ao mesmo tempo que se procuram a si próprios, à fama e aos fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: De visita a Atenas, o casal Chester e Colette faz amizade com um guia local. Mas, quando este faz uma visita, vê-se forçado a esconder o corpo inconsciente de um homem que supostamente terá atacado o casal. O trio acaba envolvido num crime do qual não pode mais fugir.

programme.title: Mulher de Ouro
programme.desc: A notável história verídica da jornada da judia Maria Altmann para recuperar o seu património e justiça para a família. Sessenta anos depois de ter fugido de Viena, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a mulher tenta recuperar os bens da família, que foram apreendidos pelos nazis.

programme.title: A Chave do Sucesso
programme.desc: Três vendedores num quarto de hotel a reflectir sobre a vida num divertido e envolvente confronto.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Depois de 20 anos fora de Edimburgo, Mark Renton está de regresso à Escócia, o único lugar a que alguma vez chamou casa. À sua espera estão os velhos amigos: Spud, Sick Boy e Begbie. Muito mudou, mas muito ficou na mesma...

programme.title: A Ilha dos Golpes
programme.desc: Jack, um surfista e trapaceiro de segunda, que vai vivendo dos "trabalhinhos" que faz no Havai, conhece uma bela mulher que tem um plano infalível para fazer fortuna. Tudo que Jack tem de fazer é entrar numa casa pobre... e sair um homem rico.

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Orgulho e Glória
programme.desc: A credibilidade de várias gerações de uma família de agentes da Polícia de Nova Iorque é posta em causa. Durante uma rusga, quatro polícias são abatidos e o detetive-chefe pede ao filho para liderar a investigação. Mas Ray percebe que o que parecia ser um ataque isolado foi, afinal, uma emboscada.

programme.title: O Predador
programme.desc: Um grupo de soldados tem de enfrentar um inimigo invisível e muito mais poderoso do que todas as suas armas. Recrutados pela CIA para resgatarem reféns, os soldados encontram um inimigo que nunca sonharam existir, o predador perfeito, uma criatura extraterrestre sem paralelo ou adversário à altura!

programme.title: Predador 2
programme.desc: Vem de uma galáxia distante para caçar e deixa um rasto de cadáveres na sua passagem. Em estado de sítio devido a uma guerra entre gangues, Los Angeles é o campo de caça perfeito para o Predador. O tenente Mike Harrigan decide investigar e coloca-se frente a frente do enigmático alienígena.

programme.title: Nightcrawler - Repórter na Noite
programme.desc: Lou Bloom é um jovem desesperado por trabalho, que descobre o alucinante mundo do crime de Los Angeles. Ao encontrar um grupo de freelancers que filmam casos de polícia, Lou entra no perigoso submundo do jornalismo criminal, onde uma sirene pode valer muitos dólares.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia formam um feliz casal de meia-idade, cuja vida se vai alterar depois de conhecerem Jamie e Darby, um jovem casal de espírito livre. Em pouco tempo, os quarentões colocam de parte os amigos da sua idade para seguirem estes jovens hipsters.

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Aqui Há Gato!
programme.desc: Tom Brand é um bilionário com pouco tempo para a família. Mas quando a filha lhe pede (novamente) um gato como prenda de aniversário, Tom decide aceder. De regresso a casa, tem um acidente e, quando recupera a consciência, percebe que está preso dentro do corpo do gato.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: Mapas Para as Estrelas
programme.desc: Uma viagem ao coração de uma família de Hollywood e ao mundo supérfluo e tortuoso das celebridades egoístas e dos seus assistentes. Ao mesmo tempo que se procuram a si próprios, à fama e aos fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos 2
programme.desc: Amy, Travis e Graham são estudantes de cinema na Universidade de Alpine. Num ambiente de forte competividade, é convocado o prestigiado prémio Hitchcock para o melhor fime, como tese de final de curso. Quando começam a rodar o filme, dão-se estranhos e terroríficos acidentes.

programme.title: Madame
programme.desc: Anne e Bob mudam-se para uma mansão em Paris e, quando preparam um luxuoso jantar de amigos, Anne apercebe-se que vão sentar-se 13 pessoas à mesa. Para evitar o número do azar, pede à sua leal criada Maria para se disfarçar de aristocrata espanhola...

programme.title: Para Além dos Limites
programme.desc: Michael é um vigarista ambicioso que elabora um plano para roubar um casino de luxo na Europa. No entanto, quando está prestes a alcançar o objetivo, encontra pela frente um enigmático rival e, misteriosamente, perde tudo vendo o seu plano desmascarado.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala
programme.desc: Mollie é uma mãe solteira à procura do pai perfeito para o seu filho. Mas Mickey, o bebé, vai fazer tudo para que a sua mãe perceba que o companheiro e pai ideal está mesmo ao seu lado.

programme.title: O Feitiço do Tempo
programme.desc: Phil, o apresentador do boletim meteorológico de um canal, é enviado a Punxstawnwey para fazer a reportagem do Dia da Marmota. Na viagem de volta, Phil e a equipa são surpreendidos por uma tempestade que os obriga a voltar à cidade. Na manhã seguinte, ouve na rádio o mesmo programa do dia anterior.

programme.title: Amar Pablo e Odiar Escobar
programme.desc: A história da ascensão e queda do senhor da droga colombiano, Pablo Escobar, fundador do cartel de Medellín, contada pela sua glamorosa amante Virgínia Vallejo, já então uma jornalista conhecida com o seu próprio programa de televisão.

programme.title: 21: A Última Cartada
programme.desc: Para pagar o curso de Medicina, Ben, um sobredotado do MIT, tenta fazer dinheiro em jogos de cartas. Ele acaba por se juntar à equipa secreta do seu professor de matemática, que, contando cartas e usando um complexo sistema de sinais, consegue "quebrar" vários casinos.

programme.title: O Décimo Círculo
programme.desc: Daniel Stone, um autor de BD, é casado com a professora universitária Laura. A filha de ambos, Trixie, é uma aluna inteligente e popular do primeiro ano do secundário. Quando Trixie diz ter sido violada pelo ex-namorado, os acontecimentos irão pôr à prova lealdades e ligações de todos os envolvidos.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Homicídio À La Carte
programme.desc: Quando um cadáver é encontrado no carro de um chef rival, Billie aceita cobrir a história no seu programa de televisão, o que vai colocar a sua vida em perigo.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Intenções Criminosas
programme.desc: O corpo de um advogado cujos casos inspiraram uma série de livros de sucesso é encontrado na praia e Billie Blessing tem de deslindar o enredo antes que a pessoa errada pague pelo crime.

programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Um remake do filme que encantou os mais novos na década de 80, que conta a história de Annie, uma jovem órfã, que mora com a sua maldosa mãe de acolhimento. Mas tudo muda quando um arrogante magnata a acolhe em sua casa, numa disfarçada ação de campanha.

programme.title: Dança Feroz
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para Houston trabalhar na escola de dança de John Burnett. Faz limpezas e pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial de Las Vegas, mesmo que, para isso, tenha de abrir mão do amor.

programme.title: Quase Famosos
programme.desc: O repórter William Miller consegue uma oportunidade na revista Rolling Stone. Apesar das objeções da sua mãe, William faz-se à estrada com uma recém-descoberta banda de rock e apercebe-se de que há muito mais para escrever sobre eles para além da sua música.

programme.title: Música e Letra
programme.desc: Alex Fletcher, um antigo elemento de um popular grupo dos anos 80, junta-se à "palavrosa" Sophie para comporem uma canção, que se destina a uma jovem estrela pop.

programme.title: O Amor nos Tempos de Cólera
programme.desc: Florentino, rejeitado pela bela Fermina quando era jovem, dedica a maior parte da sua vida adulta a relações carnais, numa tentativa desesperada de curar o seu coração partido.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Rússia czarista, final do século XIX. Anna é casada com Alexei Karenin, um destacado oficial. Mas tudo muda quando conhece o irresistível conde Vronsky, que altera a visão que ela tem de si e do mundo. Porém, o caso amoroso torna-se conhecido e Karenin sofre com as humilhações da opinião pública.

programme.title: Maridos e Mulheres
programme.desc: Gabe e Judy estão chocados com a separação dos melhores amigos. Mas esta situação faz com que eles se questionem sobre o seu relacionamento. Enquanto Gabe pensa em namoriscar uma das suas alunas, o outro casal descobre que a vida de solteiro não é assim tão boa e pensa dar nova vida ao casamento.

programme.title: Tróia
programme.desc: Na Grécia Antiga, Paris, príncipe de Tróia, seduz Helena, a rainha de Esparta, mas essa paixão desencadeia uma guerra de proporções inimagináveis. Por seu lado, Menelaus, o rei de Esparta, pede ao irmão Agamemnon, rei de Micenas, que reúna o povo grego para vingar a honra da família.

programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Amigas e Rivais
programme.desc: Larry Cook, um próspero fazendeiro do Iowa, decide reformar-se e dividir a sua terra pelas três filhas, Ginny, Rose e Caroline. Só que nem todas acolhem o legado da melhor forma e o que se segue, motivado por rivalidades diversas, acaba em tragédia...

programme.title: Patrulha do Tempo
programme.desc: Um oficial de uma agência de segurança, que regula as viagens no tempo, tem de lutar pela própria vida contra um político misterioso, mas que tem uma ligação ao seu passado.

programme.title: Encurralado
programme.desc: Buddy é um jovem pai acusado de um crime, que para tentar provar a sua inocência terá de contar a um oficial da polícia tudo o que sabe sobre os arrepiantes factos da noite anterior, que envolvem a sedução por uma mulher mais velha e o convite pelo alcoólico marido desta para a matar.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Forçado a uma reforma antecipada, Felix Gresystone apaixona-se por uma jovem em realidade virtual, esquecendo a sua relação com a mulher e a filha.

programme.title: Masaan
programme.desc: Quatro vidas cruzam-se no rio Ganges: um rapaz de uma casta mais baixa perdido de amores, uma filha que se sente culpada pelo seu encontro sexual que acaba em tragédia, um pai infeliz com uma moral duvidosa e um rapaz que apenas procura uma família.

programme.title: A Mulher
programme.desc: Uma mulher questiona as suas escolhas de vida, durante uma viagem que faz com o marido até Estocolmo, onde ele irá receber o Prémio Nobel da Literatura.

programme.title: A Vingança de Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Um filme baseado na história real do lendário Xerife Earp. Conta como reuniu os melhores homens do Oeste para vingar o cruel assassinato da sua amada Dora.

programme.title: Mães à Solta 2
programme.desc: Nas vésperas da organização do maior evento do ano, o Natal, três amigas, que apesar de sobrecarregadas de trabalho não perdem a sua loucura e boa disposição, recebem a visita das suas mães!

programme.title: A Força da Verdade
programme.desc: Bennet Omalu é um neuropatologista forense que, ao autopsiar Mike Webster, descobre que a morte se deveu a um trauma cerebral ocorrido anos antes. O homem trava uma luta contra a NFL, para que sejam reconhecidos os elevados riscos cerebrais a que os jogadores de futebol americano estão sujeitos.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, os seres humanos são criados geneticamente em laboratórios, pelo que as pessoas concebidas biologicamente são consideradas inválidas. Vincent, um inválido, desafia o seu destino ao apropriar-se da identidade genética de um homem considerado superior.

programme.title: Looney Tunes: De Novo em Acção (V.O.)
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny e Daffy Duck embarcam em mais uma aventura que combina animação e imagem real. Daffy Duck deixa Hollywood, farto de ver Bugs Bunny ser o centro das atenções, e alia-se a um duplo recentemente despedido. O objetivo é recuperar o Diamante Azul e impedir que a Corporação ACME domine o mundo.

programme.title: A Máscara de Zorro
programme.desc: Passaram mais de 20 anos desde que Don Diego de la Vega lutou com sucesso contra a opressão espanhola, com o lendário e romântico nome de Zorro. Preso durante duas décadas, tem agora de encontrar um sucessor para travar Don Rafael Montero, que regressou ao território com um louco projeto na manga.

programme.title: Cross - O Poder dos Deuses
programme.desc: Graças a uma cruz Celta, Callan possui poderes incríveis que utiliza para combater o mal. Agora, acompanhado por uma equipa de especialistas em armas, Callan combate um implacável império em Los Angeles.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby - Sonhos Vencidos
programme.desc: Frankie Dunn foi agente e treinador dos melhores pugilistas, numa vida passada nos ringues de boxe. Na sequência do doloroso afastamento da sua filha, Frankie revela uma já longa dificuldade na aproximação aos outros. Já Maggie sabe bem o que quer e tem a determinação necessária para o alcançar.

programme.title: O Enigma da Rosa
programme.desc: Uma família vê a filha mais nova ser raptada a caminho da escola e recebe uma carta do raptor a pedir um encontro antes de libertá-la. Para surpresa de todos, em vez de dinheiro, o raptor quer a confissão do segredo de um dos membros da família.

programme.title: A Crueldade de Peter
programme.desc: No início do século XX, Peter, o filho de 13 anos de uma rica família inglesa, é cruel com as crianças, os animais e os criados. Uma noite, em retaliação pela sua crueldade, é emboscado, atirado para um caixão enterrado no cemitério e esquecido. Até que um século depois ele é reencontrado...

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Um indivíduo em liberdade condicional junta-se à sua antiga equipa, que está determinada a encontrar um saco enterrado de dinheiro roubado há uma década, proveniente de uma rusga da DEA que correu mal. Ao mesmo tempo, é perseguido por um xerife reformado.

programme.title: Raposa Manhosa e Outras Histórias (V.P.)
programme.desc: Se pensas que o campo é calmo... estás enganado. Aqui encontramos animais especialmente criativos e prontos para a diversão! Se queres dormir uma boa sesta, este não é o lugar, mas, se vens para fazer amigos, junta-te à festa e sê bem-vindo!

programme.title: Bikes - Uma Aventura Sobre Rodas (V.P.)
programme.desc: Spokesville é a terra das bicicletas. Speedy, uma bicicleta de montanha, está pronta para ser líder quando o motor a gasolina chega para incomodar a cidade. Speedy e os amigos fazem tudo para vencerem a luta contra a gasolina e manter a cidade limpa.

programme.title: Big Game - Instinto Caçador
programme.desc: Um jovem, que estava acampado na floresta, ajuda o Presidente dos Estados Unidos a escapar aos seus perseguidores, após o Air Force One ser abatido e cair perto do seu acampamento.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 3 (V.P.)
programme.desc: Dececionado com os amigos, que preferem cuidar das obrigações familiares a participarem na sua viagem anual, Boog parte sozinhoe acaba num circo. Ao trocar de lugar com um artista e apaixonar-se por uma ursa russa, ele aprende que talvez não seja preciso escolher entre a família e os amigos.

programme.title: Miúdos e Graúdos
programme.desc: No funeral do antigo treinador de futebol, cinco bons amigos e antigos colegas de equipa voltam a juntar-se para passar o fim de semana do feriado de 4 de julho e reviver memórias antigas. No entanto, rapidamente vão perceber que ser adulto, não significa ter crescido...

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Esquecido
programme.desc: Estamos em 2073 e todo o planeta se encontra destruído após um ataque alienígena, há 60 anos, que obrigou à evacuação da população. Jack Harper é enviado para terminar uma missão cuja importância é vital para a sobrevivência da Humanidade, que vive agora numa colónia sob condições artificiais.

programme.title: Vida Inteligente
programme.desc: A história dos seis membros da tripulação da Estação Espacial Internacional, no momento em que a mesma se depara com uma das mais importantes descobertas na história da humanidade: a primeira prova da existência de vida extraterrestre em Marte.

programme.title: Operação Swordfish
programme.desc: Stanley Jobson é um super hacker, que está em liberdade condicional após ter sido preso por lançar um vírus informático no sistema do FBI. Entretanto, é recrutado à força por uma unidade secreta de contraterrorismo chamada Black Cell.

programme.title: Passageiro 57
programme.desc: O avião é o meio de transporte mais seguro, diz-se. Só se não contar com os riscos. Rane já planeou quatro assaltos terroristas e, em breve, haverá um quinto: o que é uma má notícia para os passageiros do Voo 163.

programme.title: Braven
programme.desc: Quando Joe Braven, um humilde lenhador, se vê confrontado com um grupo de traficantes de droga, na sua cabana isolada nas montanhas, vai fazer tudo para proteger a sua família... Até mesmo caçar!

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund
